original_text: I said to their children in the wilderness, “Do not follow the statutes of your parents or keep their laws or defile yourselves with their idols.
korean_text: 내가 광야에서 그들의 자손에게 이르기를 너희 조상들의 율례를 따르지 말며 그 규례를 지키지 말며 그 우상들로 말미암아 스스로 더럽히지 말라

sentences.original_text: I said to their children in the wilderness
Do not follow the statutes of your parents
or defile yourselves with their idols
